评论概述: Smart looking sunglasses with pink lenses
评论详情: I normally buy sunglasses with polarized lenses, but I had to make an exception for these. I love the pink lenses with the tortoise shell frames - an unusual color combination. The quality made frames are very attractive and comfortable. I'm happy that they have UV protection, but will not use while driving since they are not polarized. They also come with a drawstring pouch and a cleaning cloth. Super cute.

评论概述: Fun fashion at an affordable price.
评论详情: I usually test out a new style in a more wallet friendly version, before investing in a higher-quality pair of sunnies, and these are a wonderful choice. The frames are sturdy and well-made, while at the same time, sit nearly weightless on my head. The hinges feel secure and temples are the perfect length ... no more sliding forward when I look down at my book. Gold accents add a luxurious touch. I like that the lens offer UV light protection, a year-round consideration. A drawstring pouch and a generously sized microfiber cleaning cloth rounds out the set. Very pleased with my choice!
